abstract: Mary Callahan Erdoes, the head of JPMorgan Chase’s asset management unit, has ambitious plans for the business, including shaking up its leadership team.
snippet: Mary Callahan Erdoes, the head of JPMorgan Chase’s asset management unit, has ambitious plans for the business, including shaking up its leadership team.
lead_paragraph: 11:15 a.m. | Updated JPMorgan Chase’s $1.6 trillion asset management unit is shaking up its management, including replacing the head of institutional sales for North America, people briefed on the matter told DealBook.

headline.main: JPMorgan Shakes Up Asset Management Leadership
